snippet.title: Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
Purchase or wishlist the game at: 
https://bit.ly/2CNqa6E

Grand Tactician: The Civil War (1861-1865) Early Access Trailer. 

"Grand Tactician: The Civil War is shaping up to be the definitive American Civil War strategy game." -Wargamer.com

For more information, visit: www.grandtactician.com
